posts.post_content:
The following are for sale (all payment methods accepted, no additional fees for paypal):

Email only please (no PM's) - [url]ppgustafson@yahoo.com[/url]

Chase Pink Portrait - F. Scott Fitzgerald Stamp (guaranteed original/authentic stamp) - $old
